Package com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store

Class TaskStoreTest

java.lang.Object
com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.store.TaskStoreTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
InMemoryTaskStoreTest
public abstract class TaskStoreTest
extends java.lang.Object
Unit tests for classes implementing the TaskStore interface. Derived classes must instantiate the tested task store and possibly add additional unit tests that are specific to that implementation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected TaskStore taskStore
    The TaskStore being tested, set before each test runs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TaskStoreTest()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected TaskDescriptor dummyTaskDescriptor()  
    protected abstract TaskStore getTestTaskStore()
    Creates the tested task store, must be implemented on derived classes.
    void setupTest()  
    void testAddAndRemoveChangeListener()
    Triggers task state changes and verifies that listeners are notified of them only when they were registered.
    void testChangeListener()
    Triggers task state changes and verifies that listeners are notified of them.
    void testConcurrentClaims()
    Brute force test to ensure that the claim() operation is atomic, i.e., if concurrent threads try to claiming the same task only one of them gets the task.
    void testStateChanges()
    Triggers task state changes and verifies that they are reflected in the task store read methods.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • testStateChanges

      public void testStateChanges()
      Triggers task state changes and verifies that they are reflected in the task store read methods.

    • testChangeListener

      public void testChangeListener()
      Triggers task state changes and verifies that listeners are notified of them.

    • testAddAndRemoveChangeListener

      public void testAddAndRemoveChangeListener()
      Triggers task state changes and verifies that listeners are notified of them only when they were registered.

    • testConcurrentClaims

      public void testConcurrentClaims() throws java.lang.InterruptedException, java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
      Brute force test to ensure that the claim() operation is atomic, i.e., if concurrent threads try to claiming the same task only one of them gets the task.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException

      protected TaskDescriptor dummyTaskDescriptor()

      protected abstract TaskStore getTestTaskStore()
      Creates the tested task store, must be implemented on derived classes.
      Returns:
      The instance to test.
